Slang is HEAVILY auto-generated by tools that it first needs to build and then run.
We spent a lot of time trying to port this workflow to Premakeâ€¦
In the end we just decided to say screw it and take the auto generated files and put them in slang/generated (for the includes) and slang/source/generated (for the generated files that have .cpp files that need to get built, this gets built by the Slang-Slang project).
We also have a function in slang.lua which does a one time cleanup after upgrading versions.

Upgrading this is probably gonna suck and involve CMake generating in a separate folder, finding the files you need and copying them over.
Talk to Pursche for support, both actual and emotional.
